content.rendered:
Directed by Venky Kudumula

Written by Gautam Siddharth

Cast Nithiin (Bheeshma). Rashmika Mandanna (Chaitra). Anant Nag (Bheeshma). Jisshu Sengupta (Raghavan (as Jishu Sengupta)). Sampath Raj (ACP Deva). V.K. Naresh (Anand). Ajay (Ajay Varma). Lakshmi Gopalaswamy (Bheeshma’s Mother). Vennela Kishore (Parimal). Brahmaji (JP). Rajiv Kumar Aneja (Pandey Ji (as Rajiv Kumar A.)). Darbha Appaji Ambarisha (Bheeshma’s PA). Raghu Babu (Balram). Mime Gopi (Purushottam). Mirchi Kiran (Shiva Kumar). Kalyani Natarajan (Kalyani (as Kalyani N.)). Hebah Patel (Sarah). Pkaushikji (Prem). Pradeep Rajput (Guest Appearance). Shivakumar Ramachandravarapu (Shiva). Hitesh rathod (Bheesmaa (voice) (as Hitesh Rathod Viratian)).Pammi Sai.Sathyan. Satya (Uber Driver). Narra Srinivas (Raghavan’s Brother). Subhalekha Sudhakar (Rama Raju). Sudharshan (Employee).Temper Vamsi

Languages Telugu

Producers Ivano Fucci. Venkat Krishnamaneni. P.D.V. Prasad. Suryadevara Naga Vamsi. S. Venkatarathnam

Production Sithara Entertainment. Goldmines Telefilm
